content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
No new Lab or research‐support structure was successfully built. However, two furnace structures were actively used for metal processing during these steps:

### Iron Smelting Furnace at position (5.0, 5.0)
Consists of a furnace entity employed to convert iron ore (with coal) into iron plates.

### Copper Smelting Furnace at position (–27.0, –60.0)
Consists of a furnace entity used to smelt copper ore thereby producing copper plates.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
• get_entities() invocation issues  
 – Verify the API signature before calling get_entities. Avoid passing unexpected keyword arguments (e.g. “radius”) or an incorrect number of positional parameters.  
 – If a function might return None, initialize with an empty list to safely iterate over the results.

• Lab placement and inventory validation  
 – Ensure that a Lab unit is present in the inventory before attempting to place it at a designated location.  
 – Check that the target placement tile is unoccupied and available for construction.

• Lab crafting resource chain problems  
 – Confirm that all intermediate items (such as iron-gear-wheels, electronic-circuits, and copper-cables) are available or producible through established production chains before initiating Lab crafting.  
 – Pre-assess resource levels and production capabilities to avoid failures related to missing sub-ingredients.
